languages.text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.
languages.original_text: Когда на соседних клетках с ассасином находится не более 1 врага, противник, пытающийся переместиться на клетку, смежную с позицией ассасина, должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}, если это возможно, и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves to a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an Agility resistance test with a −<u>(2 × STR bonus)</u> penalty or become prone, if possible, and immobilised until the start of that enemy's next turn.

Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an Agility resistance test with a −<u>(2 × STR bonus)</u> penalty or fall prone, if possible, and become immobilised until the start of that enemy's next turn.

Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

languages.text: 若刺客周围的敌人不超过一名，则所有移动到刺客身边的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}点减值。未能通过检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态（如果可能），并受到{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果影响，效果持续至该名敌人下个回合为止。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 若刺客周围的敌人不超过一名，则所有移动到刺客身边的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。未能通过检定的目标会进入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态（如果可能），并受到{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果影响，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

若刺客周围的敌人不超过一名，则所有移动到刺客身边的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}。未能通过检定的目标会进入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态（如果可能），并受到{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果影响，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

若{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}周围的敌人不超过一名，则所有移动到刺客身边的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态（如果可能），并受到{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果影响，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

languages.text: Cuando el asesino solo no tenga más que 1 enemigo adyacente, cualquier enemigo que se mueva a una casilla adyacente al asesino deberá superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} o será {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} si es posible, quedando {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente turno del enemigo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} solo no tenga más que 1 enemigo adyacente, cualquier enemigo que se mueva a una casilla adyacente al asesino deberá superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} o será {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} si es posible, quedando {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo.

Cuando el asesino solo no tenga más que 1 enemigo adyacente, cualquier enemigo que se mueva a una casilla adyacente al asesino deberá superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} o será {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} si es posible, quedando {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo.

languages.text: アサシンに隣接する敵が1体以下の場合、アサシンに隣接するセルに移動した敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}のペナルティを伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功するか、可能な場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}し、その敵の次のターン開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

traits.locale_text: アサシンに隣接する敵が1体以下の場合、アサシンに隣接するセルに移動した敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}のペナルティを伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功するか、可能な場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}し、その敵の次のターン開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。

アサシンに隣接する敵が1体以下の場合、アサシンに隣接するセルに移動した敵は −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格するか、可能な場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}し、その敵の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}に隣接する敵が1体以下の場合、アサシンに隣接するセルに移動した敵は−{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格するか、可能な場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}し、その敵の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。

languages.text: Когда на соседних клетках с ассасином находится не более 1 врага, противник, пытающийся переместиться на клетку, смежную с позицией ассасина, должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}, если это возможно, и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда на соседних клетках с ассасином находится не более 1 врага, противник, пытающийся переместиться на клетку, смежную с позицией ассасина, должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u>. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}, если это возможно, и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда на соседних клетках с ассасином находится не более 1 врага, противник, пытающийся переместиться на клетку, смежную с позицией ассасина, должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u>. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}, если это возможно, и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда на соседних клетках с ассасином находится не более 1 врага, противник, пытающийся переместиться на клетку, смежную с позицией ассасина, должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}. В случае провала противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g}, если это возможно, и {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Assassine nicht mehr als 1 angrenzenden Feind hat, muss jeder weitere Feind, der auf ein an den Assassinen angrenzendes Feld zieht, eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} überstehen. Ansonsten wird er {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} und bleibt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}, und zwar bis zum Start seines nächsten Zuges.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} nicht mehr als 1 angrenzenden Feind hat, muss jeder weitere Feind, der auf ein an den Assassinen angrenzendes Feld zieht, eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} überstehen. Ansonsten wird er {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} und bleibt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}, und zwar bis zum Start seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}.

Wann immer der Assassine nicht mehr als 1 angrenzenden Feind hat, muss jeder weitere Feind, der auf ein an den Assassinen angrenzendes Feld zieht, eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}- {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} überstehe. Ansonsten wird er {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} und bleibt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}, und zwar bis zum Start seiner nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un seul ennemi est adjacent à l'assassin, tout autre ennemi atteignant une case adjacente à celle de l'assassin doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c}. Dans le cas contraire, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, si possible, et est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisé{/g} jusqu'au début du prochain tour de l'ennemi.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque 1 seul ennemi est adjacent à l'Assassin, tout autre ennemi qui rejoint une case adjacente à celle de l'Assassin doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> ou il est {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobilisé{/g}, si possible, et reste sous l'effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'ennemi.

Lorsque 1 seul ennemi est adjacent à l'Assassin, tout autre ennemi qui rejoint une case adjacente à celle de l'Assassin doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} ou il est {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobilisé{/g}, si possible, et reste sous l'effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'ennemi.

languages.text: Suikastçı'nın bitişiğinde 1'den fazla düşman bulunmadığında Suikastçı'nın bitişiğindeki bir hücreye adım atan her düşman, −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde (mümkünse) {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç olur{/g}. Bu etki, düşmanın bir sonraki turunun başına dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.
